Package io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.contracts.impl

Class SmintIoDownloadConstraintsImpl

java.lang.Object
io.smint.clapi.consumer.integration.core.contracts.impl.SmintIoDownloadConstraintsImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISmintIoDataType, ISmintIoDownloadConstraints
public class SmintIoDownloadConstraintsImpl extends Object implements ISmintIoDownloadConstraints
POJO to hold basic download constraints for assets.

  • Method Details

    • getMaxDownloads

      public Integer getMaxDownloads()
      Description copied from interface: ISmintIoDownloadConstraints
      Get the maximum allowed downloads for the asset.
      Specified by:
      getMaxDownloads in interface ISmintIoDownloadConstraints
      Returns:
      the maximum amount of downloads as a positive integer value. if value is below or equal 0, then there are no restrictions on the maximum amount of users. Returns null if no restrictions have been set or are unknown.

    • setMaxDownloads

      public SmintIoDownloadConstraintsImpl setMaxDownloads(Integer newMaxDownloads)
      Sets a new value to max downloads.
      Parameters:
      newMaxDownloads - the new maximum downloads to allow. Use null if no constraints are to be set or just unknown.
      Returns:
      this to support Fluent Interface

    • getMaxUsers

      public Integer getMaxUsers()
      Description copied from interface: ISmintIoDownloadConstraints
      Get the maximum allowed users to make use of the asset.
      Specified by:
      getMaxUsers in interface ISmintIoDownloadConstraints
      Returns:
      the maximum amount of users as a positive integer value. if value is below or equal 0, then there are no restrictions on the maximum amount of users. Returns null if no restrictions have been set or are unknown.

    • setMaxUsers

      public SmintIoDownloadConstraintsImpl setMaxUsers(Integer newMaxUsers)

      Parameters:

      this to support Fluent Interface

    • getMaxReuses

      public Integer getMaxReuses()
      Description copied from interface: ISmintIoDownloadConstraints
      Get the maximum allowed reuses of the asset.
      Specified by:
      getMaxReuses in interface ISmintIoDownloadConstraints
      Returns:
      the maximum amount of reuses as a positive integer value. if value is below or equal 0, then there are no restrictions on the maximum amount of users. Returns null if no restrictions have been set or are unknown.
